description: Organizational Culture in the current context refers to the values, beliefs, and behaviors that shape employee interactions and management's support for gender diversity. This module fosters discussions on how workplace environments impact gender-related issues.

subcategories.name: Caselet 1 | Overcoming DEI Hurdles at FinTech Pioneers: A Strategic Initiative | 15-20 Min
